name: Revenge (PlatformaVR)
description:
Your goal is to place your enemies in the right order so they can destroy each other.

The game's key feature is its realistic physics. 
 Use different tools on every level, i.e. bullets retargeting, becoming one of the enemies in the short period of time, redirection of the car, ricochet, bombs, buttons, doors, etc.
Use grip button (oculus) or  trigger button (vive, mixed reality) for taking and moving the objects, right teleport button for teleport, both trigger buttons for shooting, single grip button (oculus) or  trigger button (vive, mixed reality) for 4x speeding up the time, and both buttons  for 16x speeding up the time

Please let us know if you find the game interesting, what you like and don't like in it. Any comments on how we can improve the game are very welcome
